tool_description: Assigns severity scores to symptoms based on clinical scales and patient-reported intensity indicators.

intensity_descriptors.description: Patient-reported intensity descriptions for each symptom

scoring_scale.description: Severity scoring scale: 1-10, mild-moderate-severe, or clinical

error_messages: Empty symptoms list: Provide at least one symptom to score.
Mismatched arrays: Number of intensity descriptors must match number of symptoms if provided.
Invalid scoring scale: Use one of: 1-10, mild-moderate-severe, clinical.
Invalid symptom format: Symptoms must be provided as text strings.
usage: Provide symptoms and optional intensity descriptors. The tool assigns standardized severity scores based on clinical assessment criteria.

severity_scores.description: Numerical severity scores for each symptom
